channel.title: Hosting
channel.description:
well i just got a old computer and i'm asking to you guys if this is good to run a server with:
[b]INFO[/b]
OS : Windows 2003 Server Web Edition Processor : Intel core QUAD X3350 2.66 Ghz 1333Mhz with 12MB Cache Memory : 4096MB (Kingston DDR2 800 PC6400 ECC)
Hard Drive : 500 GB

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I have one question, if you just got this computer then how does it have 1000mb bandwith?

Like ziplock said install Linux and you will be happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

It’s pretty nice. You should install Linux to it if you’re just going to be hosting with it.

Read full topic
